title: Module 2: ROS 2 Fundamentals
description: Welcome to Module 2, where we transition from the conceptual foundations of Physical AI to the practical tools that bring robots to life. In this module, we will dive deep into the Robot Operating System 2 (ROS 2), the most widely used open-source framework for robotics software development. Understanding ROS 2 is not just a technical skill; it is the key to unlocking a vast ecosystem of tools, libraries, and community knowledge that will accelerate your journey in robotics.

next.title: Chapter 1: ROS 2 Architecture and Core Concepts
